TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit EditorPartChrome extends System.Object

summary.span: Enables developers to override the rendering for only the selected sections of controls in an zone.

span.span: Enables developers to override the rendering for only the selected sections of controls in an zone.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Chrome 的外围设备的用户界面 (UI) 元素引用该区域中包含的每个 Web 部件控件或服务器控件的范围。Chrome refers to the peripheral user interface (UI) elements that frame each Web Parts control or server control contained in a zone. 控件的镶边包括其边框时，其标题栏和图标、 标题文本和谓词菜单标题栏中显示。The chrome for a control includes its border, its title bar, and the icons, title text, and verbs menu that appear within the title bar. Chrome 的外观设置在区域级别和适用于该区域中的所有控件。The appearance of the chrome is set at the zone level, and applies to all the controls in the zone. Web 部件控件集使用类来呈现的镶边控件。The Web Parts control set uses the class to render the chrome for controls. 此外，此类提供了开发人员自定义的任何渲染方法中控制区域。Additionally, this class provides a way for developers to customize the rendering of any controls in an zone. 例如，你可以重写中定义方法以自定义某些特定样式特性区域。For example, you can override the method to customize some specific style attributes defined in the zone. 类包含当你想要重写的呈现时非常有用的几个重要方法控件。The class contains several important methods that are useful when you want to override the rendering of controls. 其中一个是构造函数，则重写时，你使用在自定义的方法类来创建自定义实例对象。One is the constructor, which you use when you override the method in a custom class to create an instance of your custom object. 另一个有用方法是方法，你可以使用来控制的内容区域的区域 （而不是 chrome 元素，如页眉、 页脚和标题栏） 中的控件的呈现。Another useful method is the method, which you can use to control the rendering of the content area of controls in a zone (as opposed to chrome elements such as headers, footers, and title bars). 最后，如果你希望的呈现的所有方面的完全编程控制控件，可以重写方法。Finally, if you want complete programmatic control over all aspects of rendering the controls, you can override the method. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用类重写的默认呈现中控制区域。The following code example demonstrates how to use the class to override the default rendering of controls in an zone. 代码示例包含三个部分：The code example has three parts: - 一个用户控件，使你能够更改 Web 部件页面上的显示模式。A user control that enables you to change display modes on a Web Parts page. - 承载在示例中的所有控件的网页。A Web page that hosts all the controls in the example. - 包含自定义的源代码的类类和区域。A class that contains the source code for a custom class and zone. 下面的代码示例的第一部分是用户控件。The first part of the code example is the user control. 用户控件的源代码来自于另一个主题。The source code for the user control comes from another topic. 对于此代码示例正常工作，你需要获取该用户控件从.ascx 文件[演练： 在 Web 部件页面上更改显示模式](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/24e42f74-82dc-4c13-8574-130398985fc0)主题，并在此代码示例的.aspx 页所在的文件夹中的文件的位置。For this code example to work, you need to obtain the .ascx file for the user control from the [Walkthrough: Changing Display Modes on a Web Parts Page](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/24e42f74-82dc-4c13-8574-130398985fc0) topic, and place the file in the same folder as the .aspx page in this code example. 该示例的第二部分是网页。The second part of the example is the Web page. 请注意，没有`Register`指令文件用于注册已编译的组件和标记前缀顶部附近。Note that there is a `Register` directive near the top of the file to register the compiled component and a tag prefix. 另请注意页面引用使用元素的自定义编辑器区域``。Also note that the page references the custom editor zone using the element ``. [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_EditorPartChrome_Overview#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_EditorPartChrome_Overview/CS/EditorPartDemo.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_EditorPartChrome_Overview#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_EditorPartChrome_Overview/VB/EditorPartDemo.aspx#1)] 该示例的第三个部分包含的自定义编辑器一部分 chrome 和编辑器部件区域的实现。The third part of the example contains the implementation of the custom editor part chrome and editor part zone. `MyEditorZone` 扩展和替代以返回自定义编辑器一部分 chrome。`MyEditorZone` extends and overrides to return the custom editor part chrome. `MyEditorPartChrome` 在编辑器部件控件的背景色更改方法。`MyEditorPartChrome` changes the background color of the editor part control in the method. 在中更改该区域的背景色方法和文本添加到中的编辑器部分方法。The background color of the zone is changed in the method, and text is added to the editor part in the method. [!code-csharp[WebParts_EditorPartChrome_Overview#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_EditorPartChrome_Overview/CS/source.cs#2)] [!code-vb[WebParts_EditorPartChrome_Overview#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_EditorPartChrome_Overview/VB/source.vb#2)]

span.para: 如果从继承类，必须创建自定义区域以返回你自定义类。此类概述的示例部分演示如何创建自定义区域以返回自定义类

If you inherit from the class, you must create a customized zone to return your customized class. The Example section of this class overview demonstrates how to create a customized zone to return a customized class

remarks.format: ## Remarks 构造函数初始化的新实例类。The constructor initializes a new instance of the class. 它主要由区域在其方法创建的实例处理 chrome 呈现和任何自定义呈现的对象区域中的控件。It is used primarily by an zone in its method to create an instance of the object that handles the chrome rendering and any custom rendering for controls in the zone.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法创建对象，由用于对象用于呈现控件。The method creates a object that is used by the object to render an control. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何重写方法可以更改编辑器部件控件的背景色。The following code example demonstrates how to override the method to change the background color of the editor part control. 所需要运行该示例的完整代码，包括 Web 页后，可以承载这些控件，请参阅示例部分类概述。For the full code required to run the example, including the Web page to host these controls, see the Example section of the class overview. span.para: 如果从继承类，可以选择替代方法，并从具有自定义样式的基方法的样式信息属性你想要添加的合并。有关演示，请参阅示例部分。

If you inherit from the class, you can optionally override the method, and merge the style information from the base method with custom style attributes that you want to add. For a demonstration, see the Example section.

summary.span: Performs tasks that must be done prior to rendering controls.

span.span: Performs tasks that must be done prior to rendering controls.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法允许你执行必须期间完成的任务事件和呈现控件，如对控件应用样式表时，无法完成。The method allows you to perform tasks that must be done during the event and cannot be done when the control is rendered, such as applying a style sheet to a control. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何重写方法可以更改编辑器区域的背景色。The following code example demonstrates how to override the method to change the background color of the editor zone. 所需要运行该示例的完整代码，包括 Web 页后，可以承载这些控件，请参阅示例部分类概述。For the full code required to run the example, including the Web page to host these controls, see the Example section of the class overview. [!code-csharp[WebParts_EditorPartChrome_Overview#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_EditorPartChrome_Overview/CS/source.cs#4)] [!code-vb[WebParts_EditorPartChrome_Overview#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_EditorPartChrome_Overview/VB/source.vb#4)]

summary.span: Renders a complete control with all its sections.

span.span: Renders a complete control with all its sections.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法呈现完整具有标头、 内容和页脚的控件。The method renders the complete control, with header, contents, and footer. 重写此方法提供的开发人员可以完全对呈现的所有方面进行编程控制`editorPart`; 因此，重写此方法是很复杂。Overriding this method gives a developer complete programmatic control over rendering all aspects of `editorPart`; for that reason, overriding this method is quite complex.

summary.span: Renders the main content area of an control, excluding the header and footer.

span.span: Renders the main content area of an control, excluding the header and footer.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法使你能够重写的正文区的呈现`editorPart`，同时保持为默认呈现呈现页眉和页脚。The method enables you to override the rendering of the body area of `editorPart`, while leaving rendering of the header and footer to the default rendering. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何重写方法将文本添加到编辑器部分。The following code example demonstrates how to override the method to add text to the editor part. 所需要运行该示例的完整代码，包括 Web 页后，可以承载这些控件，请参阅示例部分类概述。For the full code required to run the example, including the Web page to host these controls, see the Example section of the class overview. [!code-csharp[WebParts_EditorPartChrome_Overview#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_EditorPartChrome_Overview/CS/source.cs#5)] [!code-vb[WebParts_EditorPartChrome_Overview#5](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_EditorPartChrome_Overview/VB/source.vb#5)]

span.para: 你可以选择重写方法。因此，只需执行任何呈现自定义项所需的，然后调用其方法。
You can optionally override the method. If so, you can simply perform whatever rendering customizations you want for , and then call its method.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性提供对的引用为其包含的控件的区域对象提供呈现。The property provides a reference to the zone that contains the controls for which the object provides rendering.
